name: Teodora Llop
desc: Un exemple de senyora treballadora de cap a peus. En un moment delicat de la història del país, va mudar-se a Catalunya i desde llavors ha fet tota mena de feines: carnissera, enquadernadora de llibres i moltes més. Té mil històries per explicar i les explica amb un somriure ben gran!
descENG: The very definition of a hardworking woman, through and through. During a difficult time in the country's history, she moved to Catalonia and has done every kind of job imaginable since then—butcher, bookbinder, and many more. She has a thousand stories to tell, and she tells them all with the biggest smile!
